Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.violations

Class Violation

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.violations.Violation
  • public class Violation
extends Object
    Represents a Checkstyle Rule violation. Holds details of where a violation occured, a summary of the rule violated and an optional RuleDefinition that can be shown to the end-user. Should be instantiated when a violation occurs, and passed to appropriate objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Violation​(String summary, bluej.extensions2.BClass blueClass, bluej.extensions2.editor.TextLocation location, RuleDefinition ruleDefinition)
      Constructs a new Violation with a RuleDefinition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      bluej.extensions2.BClass getBClass()
      Returns the BlueJ Class instance where the violation was found.
      File getFile()
      Returns the file where the violation was found.
      bluej.extensions2.editor.TextLocation getLocation()
      Returns the TextLocation of where the violation was found in the file.
      RuleDefinition getRuleDefinition()
      Returns the RuleDefinition of the violated rule.
      String getSummary()
      Returns a brief explanation of the violation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Violation

        public Violation​(String summary,
                 bluej.extensions2.BClass blueClass,
                 bluej.extensions2.editor.TextLocation location,
                 RuleDefinition ruleDefinition)
        Constructs a new Violation with a RuleDefinition.
        Parameters:
        summary - a String containing a brief explanation of the violation
        blueClass - the BlueJ Class file where the violation was found
        location - the TextLocation where the violation was found in the file
        ruleDefinition - a RuleDefinition containing a description of the violated rule
